## SignalOptions type

Options for customizing Signal behavior.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SignalOptions = {
    instrument?: (impl: <T>(value: T) => SignalFunction<T>, instrumentation: InstrumentationContext, context: ServiceContext) => <T>(value: T) => SignalFunction<T>;
};
```
**References:** [SignalFunction](../signalfunction/)<!-- -->, [InstrumentationContext](../../lattice/instrumentationcontext/)<!-- -->, [ServiceContext](../../lattice/servicecontext/)

## Example

Adding instrumentation

```ts
const signalService = Signal({
  instrument(impl, instr, ctx) {
    return (value) => {
      const sig = impl(value);
      instr.register(sig, 'signal');
      return sig;
    };
  },
});
```
